snippet.title: Five Years Old Memories - release trailer
snippet.description:
Five Years Old Memories is out now on Steam and itch.io !

This is an interactive omnibus animation based on interviews with my friends about their memories around the age of five, based on their personal sensory memories and episodes.

Steam▶︎ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2932550/Five_Years_Old_Memories/
itch▶︎ https://komitsu.itch.io/five-years-old-memories
App Store(iPad)▶︎https://apps.apple.com/app/five-years-old-memories/id1643670905

Interview, Animation, Design - Komitsu
Engineer - Shoto Hayakawa 
Music - Natsumi Nogawa

Created as part of the Artists-in-Residence Online program organized by NTT InterCommunication Center [ICC].

ver 1.2.0
2024
